scripts.copy_wds: shx cp node_modules/@uswds/uswds/dist/css/uswds.css assets/css && shx cp node_modules/@uswds/uswds/dist/js/uswds.js assets/js && shx cp node_modules/@uswds/uswds/dist/js/uswds-init.js assets/js && shx cp -r node_modules/@uswds/uswds/dist/fonts/* assets/fonts && shx cp -r node_modules/@uswds/uswds/dist/img/* assets/img
